author: bpendleton
msg: This patch was contributed by Houx Zhang (houxzhang at gmail dot com)
This change adds a new test program, ij3Test.java, to the
tools JUnit suite, and removes the old ij3.sql test program
The purpose of the ij3Test program is to verify that ij can detect
the driver information by examining the ij.database property at startup.

author: todd
msg: HDFS-2170. Address remaining TODOs in HDFS-1073 branch. Contributed by Todd Lipcon.

author: rhuijben
msg: Make ra_serf use a subpool for every log item instead of storing all of them
in the same pool. This also makes the pool passed to the log receiver a
(push_state): Create a subpool for the log item and everything inside.
(start_log): Copy string into the info pool. Fixes a possible pointer
(end_log): Destroy the subpool when popping the item from the xml state.

author: todd
msg: HDFS-2169. Clean up TestCheckpoint and remove TODOs. Contributed by Todd Lipcon.
